comment.text: This translation key is used to display a descriptive text for an "Extra Storage" feature in a storage plan upgrade process. It appears as part of a dropdown or radio button selection and provides the user with information about the available extra storage ({{storageUnit}}).

usage.context:
<QuantityPicker
 value={amount}
 minValue={100}
 maxValue={maxStorageLimit}
 step={1}
 title={t("ExtraStorage", { storageUnit: t("Common:Gigabyte") })}
 showPlusSign
 onChange={onChangeNumber}
 isDisabled={hasScheduledStorageChange || isLoading}
 items={amountTabs()}
 withoutContorls={hasScheduledStorageChange}
